flawed_nl_solution:
Three years ago, his sons were 16 - 3 = <<16-3=13>>13 years old.
Three years ago, Beau was 13 + 13 + 13 = <<13+13+13=93>>93 years old.
Today, Beau is 93 + 3 = <<93+3=96>>96 years old.
#### 96

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 39, not 93. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
